author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5406: Intermittent failures in CompressTableTest and TruncateTableTest
Push retry logic down to GenericStatement.prepare() so that it also
covers the code path from Connection.prepareStatement(). The previous
location only covered compilations requested by the execute methods.

author: mukulg
msg: improving logic to find value of 'xpathDefaultNamespace' for <assert>. we now look into the included XSD document as well, to get this value (this was specified in one of XSD 1.1 testsuite tests).
